short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto deploy wxapp to wx editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is purposed to deploy the code package of the application "WxApp" to Weixin editor through few user's click steps.
It's more convenient and time-saving than manual deployment.
